rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {CHE2162}
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-CHEM, MAECHEM01} Otherwise true

description: This unit will explore cleaner production and sustainability concepts, the principles of process design and development and associated flow sheets, systematic approaches to waste minimisation in process and utility systems, the methodology of life cycle assessment and application of life cycle assessment to processes and products. These themes will be developed in lectures and supported by student project work related to selected industrial processes.
